info.title: Convergent Invoicing Invoicing Document - Read
info.description: This API enables you to read invoicing documents in Convergent Invoicing. You can read entire invoicing documents or only parts of the data, using the provided filters. In addition, you can also set or remove the print lock of an invoicing document using the corresponding actions.

x-sap-shortText: Read Invoicing Documents in Convergent Invoicing using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Convergent Invoicing - Invoice Creation for Usage and Service(2BG)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2BG " Link To BP ")

[Convergent Invoicing - Management and Rating of Consumption Items(3DX)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3DX " Link To BP ")
[Convergent Invoicing - Recurring and One-Off Items(2T3)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2T3 " Link To BP ")
